name: Silent Age :The End Of Happiness
description:
A story driven click and point game. Help jonah find another world with less evil

A sad story about human nature and sacrifice. Long long ago, in the broken age, Jonah, an ugly but good-natured person who was grown up in an orphanage. He did’t get much love and happiness in life. Until one day, The wind blows him a handbill advertising a celebration in glittering Loondon. Could this be the answer and end to Jonah's dreams? Or leading him to an another world full of evil? Start this click and point adventure with Jonah and find the ending your self.

Silent Age :The end of happiness is an point and click game with creepy steampunk aesthetic and beautiful art, the gameplay is simple but story is attractive.

This is not a happy game and not just for pleasure, We hope to give you more insight about sacrifice, friendship,evil and human nature.

Completion time: 15-20 mins.
A click and point game.
